title: Mac problems
body: I'm trying to open lol on my MacBook Air but it just shows the league of legends icon and then goes away and nothing happens. please help me to find a way to open it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#mq4) for me, let me know if this helps.
